ComicInfo.Penciller: Bilquis Evely,Jack Jadson,Ronilson Freire,Bilquis Evely,Ronilson Freire,Jack Jadson
ComicInfo.Summary:
Thirsty, Thirsty Town: Sailor Jim captures Mala the mermaid and holds her captive on his ranch. Vampirella summons her folk to free her.
Snow-White Revamped: Queen Lilith wants to be the fairest in the land, so she puts Vampirella on ice. Adam and Pendragon break her out and she kills the Queen.
Feary Tales: Recap of previous issue and intro to next story.
ComicInfo.Title: Thirsty, Thirsty Town; Snow-White Revamped; Feary Tales
ComicInfo.Writer: Denis St. John,Gail Simone,Nancy A. Collins,Steve Bissette,Gail Simone,Stephen R. Bissette,Denis St. John,Nancy A. Collins
